query:
-- Query modificado para que muestre el tiempo que tiene excedente la ultima pieza
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
  system_id, system_id|| '-' || To_Char(pd, 'yyyymmddhh24mi')id,
  pd process_date,
  Round(((lead(PD,1,sysdate)OVER(ORDER BY PD)-pd)*24*60)-((Lead(CYCLE_TIME,1,1534)OVER(ORDER BY pd))/60),1) DeadTime
FROM
(SELECT pROCESS_DATE pd, CYCLE_TIME, system_id
FROM LR4_SHIM_ASSEMBLY
WHERE SYSTEM_ID = 'CYBOND38'
AND PROCESS_DATE > TO_DATE(To_Char(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ||' 06:30','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
ORDER BY PROCESS_DATE)
)
WHERE deadtime > 5
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
  system_id, system_id|| '-' || To_Char(pd, 'yyyymmddhh24mi')id,
  pd process_date,
  Round(((lead(PD,1,sysdate)OVER(ORDER BY PD)-pd)*24*60)-((Lead(CYCLE_TIME,1,1534)OVER(ORDER BY pd))/60),1) DeadTime
